channel.title: Interface help requested
channel.description:
Does anyone know how to launch a interface like makeovermage by clicking on for example the "Run" button? i have been messing around, but just couldnt find it, i also tried google and the search button...
I did find out how to set it like up, but it sets the interface in the tabs area, not in the center of the gaming screen, also this is for a pi.

item.title: Interface help requested
item.dc:creator: @Coldmedicine Coldmedicine
item.description:
@Coldmedicine wrote:

Does anyone know how to launch a interface like makeovermage by clicking on for example the “Run” button? i have been messing around, but just couldnt find it, i also tried google and the search button…

I did find out how to set it like up, but it sets the interface in the tabs area, not in the center of the gaming screen, also this is for a pi.
